Articles.Content: Well I finally got around to getting my forum account set back up (not that I used my old one all that much), but anyways I just wanted to drop by and say hello to everybody and say that I'm looking forward to continuing to play KSP for a very long time to come.

Hi Mystech welcome back to the community

It looks like your old account did not survive the forum move, but you can only have one anyway so no big deal, also this is off topic (but inspired by your name) but Anachronox rocks

Well just a quick question, I'm trying to change some stuff around (avatar, signature, etc.) but I'm getting a message that is telling me I don't have permission to do any of it, is there a wait period before I can do this?

No, it's because you are currently in the group Curious George which is where you have under five posts (they do this to stop spammers). Once all the five posts have been approved, there is a script that runs to move people up a group so you should have your permissions within 30 minutes, hopefully.

Hope this helps.
